other_title: コール・ミー・トゥナイト (Japanese)
plot: Rumi's met a lot of guys through her job, and it's probably fair to assume that most of them could be said to have some sort of problem, but a man who literally turns into a beast when he gets turned on may be outside of this perky call girl's field of expertise. Still, a little challenge every now and again stimulates the mind and makes life so much more interesting, so she's willing to give it a shot.
insert_song: "Anata ni RAINY DAY" (あなたにRAINY DAY) by Rumi Natsumi
"Fuan na Jealousy" (不安なジェラシー) by Rumi Natsumi
